headline: A Look At VICI Properties (VICI) Valuation After Recent Share Price Softness
summary: What VICI Properties’ Recent Returns Tell Investors VICI Properties (VICI) has drawn fresh attention after a mixed stretch of share performance, with a small gain over the past day but weaker results over the past 3 months and year. See our latest analysis for VICI Properties. At a share price of $28.11, VICI’s short term momentum has softened, with a 90 day share price return of a 6.27% decline and a one year total shareholder return of a 0.29% decline, even though the five year total...
